summary: This document is an email chain discussing a Breitbart news report from August 10, 2019, which claimed prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death. The sender expresses suspicion that prison staff may be paid contacts for media and notes the issue has been discussed at high levels of government.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news report being discussed; his death in prison is the central topic.

events.title: Breitbart Report on Epstein Death
events.description: Breitbart publishes a report claiming prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Email Discussion of Report
events.description: An email chain discusses the Breitbart report, with the sender questioning how the media obtained the information and speculating about staff being paid contacts.

keyFacts: A news report on August 10, 2019, claimed prison guards skipped mandatory checks before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The email sender suspects there may be prison staff who are paid contacts for local media outlets.
The issue of Epstein's death and the circumstances surrounding it had been discussed at the Department of Justice level 'all the way to the White House'.
The sender questions how the media outlet obtained the information about the skipped checks, calling it 'unbelievable'.
